sql.if: where ${search} in ( select userid from member where name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
or writer in ( select userid from member where name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

mapper.select: select n.*, (select name from member where userid = writer) name from (select rownum no, n.* from (select * from notice order by root, step desc) n order by no desc) n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (id, root, title, content, writer) values ( seq_notice.nextval, seq_notice.currval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select n.*, (select name from member where userid=writer) name from notice n where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update notice set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
